title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Ken Matthews guest hosts for Rush on Monday. The theft of the election. Bill Barr doesn’t think there is a need for a special counsel. Trump’s Pennsylvania appeal. China’s hacking spree. A game of misdirection. Democrat strategy to take the cities and use them to leverage the rest of the state. Patrick Byrne tweets. Trump advisors want him to lose. Ashamed of the Republican Party. The Epoch Times: “Who’s Stealing America?”

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Supreme Court challenges in Pennsylvania. No one has looked at the evidence yet. Mask Nazis. You’re either blind or self-serving to deny the election problem. Leftist hatred for small business is about control. Why has our government turned its back on a stolen election? Rescue story. Joe Biden’s take on election fraud. This is the last chance we have to stop the absurdity. Why even entertain the idea of serving with Joe Biden? The threat of China. Truth and Reconciliation Commission.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Employers can force you to get a COVID vaccine. Why should farmers feed the people who wish to destroy them? At this rate, we’ll be socialist by New Year’s. Too many people have come forward about election fraud for it to be a lie. How long do we put up with our news media trashing us? Late night talk shows replace real interviews. The uninformed turn to celebrities instead of credibility. George Clooney and Stephen Colbert show how out of touch they are. The Epoch Times documentary, “Who’s Stealing America?” We should all have a fair and honest election. Cuomo calls for banning flights from the U.K.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
